In recent months, we at xto10x have been speaking with founders and experts to develop a definitive point of view on GenAI applications in startups. Not to talk about the buzz, but to help companies move from curiosity to real deployment.

That means understanding how GenAI can drive measurable impact across functions: product, engineering, sales, customer support, marketing, and more. It also means understanding whatâ€™s hype and whatâ€™s real.

We have kickstarted several projects that may significantly increase the pace of Gen AI adoption in the ecosystem. Weâ€™re looking to partner with mission aligned individuals: experts whoâ€™ve helped companies deploy GenAI in live workflows or builders who have coached teams on the practical nuances of adopting Gen AI in the workplace.

If this sounds like you or someone you know, please DM me. We would love to learn from your experience and explore meaningful collaborations.

Project based role (Procurement - Contract Cell & Purchase) :- 

1. Devised an Excel-Macro Based Procurement MIS Dashboard to enable quick decision making & provide improved visibility into Raw Materials at various points in the supply chain.
Parameters Captured:- Safety Stock Alerts, Re-order Point, Consumption Trend, Purchase Order History, Price Trends, Landed Cost vs. Material Cost, Supplier Database

2. Devised a dashboard for monitoring the movement of ageing inventory (Stock without orders)

3. Implemented an internal process check to improve Audit Compliance in contracts (Work Orders) â€“ Standardized deduction clauses and Pre-Audit Checklist

4. Studied Major Logistics contracts of Finishing Mills & Mining Contracts â€“ Identified scope gaps and cost reduction opportunities worth 20% of contract Value.

September 5, 2014, Anil Kumar and Abhishek studied together
September 5, 2014,Anil KumarandAbhishekstudied together
I had the pleasure of working with Abhishek as my batchmate for 2 years and my team mate in the Alumni committee. 
 
Abhishek is self driven with a strong commitment to the task in hand. His contribution to building the Alumni relations at IIFT is commendable and helped to reach out to hundreds of new Alumni and build a strong network. He is always focussed to complete the task at hand on time with high impact. 
 
He is always a dependable and indispensable team member and I am very sure he would be a great asset to any team he joins. I wish him all the best for his future endeavors.
